raw_words: <<U0>> Monica : Alright . Phoebe ? <<U1>> Phoebe : Okay , okay . <<U2>> Phoebe : If I were omnipotent for a day , I would want , um , world peace , no more hunger , good things for the rain ... forest ... And bigger boobs ! <<U3>> Ross : Yeah , see ... you took mine . Chandler , what about you ? <<U4>> Chandler : Uh , if I were omnipotent for a day , I would ... make myself omnipotent forever . <<U5>> Rachel : See , there is always one guy . " If I had a wish , I would wish for three more wishes . " <<U6>> All : Hey Joey . Hi . Hey , buddy . <<U7>> Monica : Hey , Joey , what would you do if you were omnipotent ? <<U8>> Joey : Probably kill myself ! <<U9>> Monica : ... Excuse me ? <<U10>> Joey : Hey , if Little Joey dead , then I got no reason to live ! <<U11>> Ross : Joey , uh ... OMnipotent . <<U12>> Joey : You are ?

<<U0>> Ross : Get him ! GET HIM ! Get him ! Get ... YESSS ! Not laughing now , are you pal ! <<U1>> Chandler : See buddy , that is all you need , a bunch of toothless guys hitting each other with sticks . <<U2>> Ross : Pass it ! Pass it ! <<U3>> Chandler : He is open ! <<U4>> All : Shoot ! Shoot ! Shoot ! <<U5>> Chandler : Hey , look , we are on that TV thing !

<<U0>> Chandler : Well , what ? What ? What is it ? That she left you ? That she likes women ? That she left you for another woman that likes women ? <<U1>> Ross : Little louder , okay , I think there is a man on the twelfth floor in a coma that did not quite hear you ... <<U2>> Chandler : Then what ? <<U3>> Ross : My first time with Carol was ... <<U4>> Joey : What ? <<U5>> Ross : It was my first time . <<U6>> Joey : With Carol ? Oh . <<U7>> Chandler : So in your whole life , you have only been with one ... oh . <<U8>> Joey : Whoah , boy , hockey was a big mistake ! There was a whole bunch of stuff we could have done tonight !

<<U0>> Ross : How we doing , you guys ready ? <<U1>> Monica : Mom already called this morning to remind me not to wear my hair up . Did you know my ears are not my best feature ? <<U2>> Ross : Some days it is all I can think about . <<U3>> Phoebe : Hi , sorry I am late , I could not find my bearings .

<<U0>> Carol : Anytime you are ready . <<U1>> Ross : Ok , ok , here we go . <<U2>> Ross : Ok , where am I talking to , here ? <<U3>> Ross : I mean , uh , well , there is one way that seems to offer a certain acoustical advantage , but ... <<U4>> Carol : Just aim for the bump . <<U5>> Ross : Ok , ok , ok , ok , here goes . <<U6>> Ross : You know , I , you know , can not do this . <<U7>> Ross : Uh , this is too weird . <<U8>> Ross : I feel stupid . <<U9>> Carol : So do not do it , it is fine . You do not have to do it just because Susan does it . <<U10>> Ross : Hello , baby . Hello , hello .

<<U0>> Phoebe : Oh , hi Max ! Hey , do you know everybody ? <<U1>> Max : No . Have you seen David ? <<U2>> Phoebe : No , no , he has not been around . <<U3>> Max : Well , if you see him , tell him to pack his bags . We are going to Minsk . <<U4>> Phoebe : Minsk ? <<U5>> Max : Minsk . It is in Russia . <<U6>> Phoebe : I know where Minsk is . <<U7>> Max : We got the grant . Three years , all expenses paid . <<U8>> Phoebe : So when , when do you leave ? <<U9>> Max : January first

<<U0>> Monica : Wendy , we had a deal ! Yeah , you promised ! Wendy ! Wendy ! Wendy ! <<U1>> Rachel : Who was that ? <<U2>> Monica : Wendy bailed . I have no waitress . <<U3>> Rachel : Oh ... that is too bad . Bye bye . <<U4>> Monica : Ten dollars an hour . <<U5>> Rachel : No . <<U6>> Monica : Twelve dollars an hour . <<U7>> Rachel : Mon . I wish I could , but I have made plans to walk around . <<U8>> Monica : You know , Rachel , when you ran out of your wedding , I was there for you . I put a roof over your head , and if that means nothing to you <<U9>> Monica : Twenty dollars an hour . <<U10>> Rachel : Done .

<<U0>> Joey : All right , I will give you this , Mr . Peanut is a better dresser . <<U1>> Joey : I mean he is got the monocle , he is got the top hat ... <<U2>> Phoebe : You know he is gay ? <<U3>> Ross : I just wanna clarify this : are you outing Mr . Peanut ? <<U4>> Danielle : Chandler ? <<U5>> Chandler : Danielle ! Hi ! Uh ... everybody , this is Danielle , Danielle , everybody . <<U6>> All : Hi . <<U7>> Chandler : What are you doing here ?
